data.name: BtnCheckForNewVersionContent
data.value: Check for a new version of Signals

data.name: AboutParagraph1
data.value: Signals tracks the performance of your investments and alerts you to significant events such as a double in price or a large percentage drop.

data.name: AboutParagraph2
data.value: You can use this application right now, just as it is, to track a couple of items but to get the most from it, you'll want to set up an account with data provider Finnhub. Fortunately, this is easy to do. Click the button below to visit Finnhub and get your free API key right now. You don't have to give a lot of information (just an email address) and they don't spam you. Once you have your key, enter it in the application's Settings page.

data.name: AboutParagraph3
data.value: Signals does not provide investment advice. By using this application, you are accepting full responsibility for making your own investment decisions and for the performance of your investments.
